Summary: saw a bright object drop, hover, and then shoot across the sky at a phenomenal rate of speed
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in New Kensington
There were no other sightings in New Kensington on or around July 13th 2012
divs: sighting detailson the morning of july 13 2012 @1 am. i was woken up by my dog having to go outside. i let her out and was standing on my porch looking south when i saw what appeared to be a shooting star. it dropped almost straight down, hovered for about a second, and then shoot across the sky at a phenomenal rate of speed. it covered a distance of probly 2 miles in a split second. i ran to my car, 10 feet away and grabbed my binoculars. it was a round pulsating\flashing white light with red and blue mixed in. it looked fuzzy\hazy. i only got to observe it for about a minute before it dropped out of sight behind some trees.
